song.eTitle: For Thee, O Dear, Dear Country

verses.verse: For thee, O dear country, Mine eyes their vigils keep; For very love beholding Thy holy name, they weep.
O one, O only mansion! O Paradise of joy! Where tears are ever banish'd And smiles have no alloy;
O sweet and blessed country, The home of God's elect! O sweet and blessed country That eager hearts expect!
